metadata.name: Findstr GPP Passwords
metadata.comment: Look for the encrypted cpassword value within Group Policy Preference files on the Domain Controller. This value can be decrypted with gpp-decrypt.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\find.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\findstr.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('find\\.exe', 'findstr\\.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cpassword')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\sysvol\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xml')))

output.summary: Look for the encrypted cpassword value within Group Policy Preference files on the Domain Controller. This value can be decrypted with gpp-decrypt.
